summary.span: 表示与某个实体关联的声明的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of claims that are associated with an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建 类后，无法对其进行更改。After the class has been created, it cannot be changed. 在使用基于声明的授权时，一项常见任务就是检查 的内容以查找特定类型的声明。Examining the content of a for particular types of claims is a common task when using claim-based authorization. 若要检查 以查找是否存在特定声明，请使用 方法。To examine a for the presence of particular claims, use the method. 与直接循环访问 相比，该方法可以提供更好的性能。The method provides better performance than iterating directly over the . ## Examples [!code-csharp[c_ClaimSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_claimset/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[c_ClaimSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_claimset/vb/myauthorizationpolicy.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这种类型的 对象通常用作由当前应用程序颁发的 的 属性的值。This type of object is typically used as the value of the property for a that is issued by the current application. 例如，在应用程序对用户名和密码进行身份验证后，它创建一个表示用户的 ，并将 属性设置为 。For example, after an application authenticates a username and password, it creates a that represents the user with the property set to .
